history.proof: split. - intros H x H'. destruct x; try destruct l; auto. + hauto lq: on use: Rbar_opp_involutive, Rbar_opp_le unfold: Rbar_is_lower_bound. + sfirstorder depth: 3. + hauto lq: on use: Rbar_opp_le, Rbar_opp_involutive unfold: Rbar_is_lower_bound. + hauto lq: on use: Rbar_opp_involutive, Rbar_opp_le unfold: Rbar_opp, Rbar_is_lower_bound. + sfirstorder depth: 3. + sfirstorder depth: 3. + sfirstorder depth: 3. - hauto use: Rbar_opp_involutive, Rbar_opp_le unfold: Rbar_is_lower_bound, Rbar_is_upper_bound.

exceptions.exn: In environment E : Rbar -> Prop l : Rbar H : Rbar_is_lower_bound (fun x : Rbar => E (Rbar_opp x)) (Rbar_opp l) x : Rbar H' : E x Unable to unify "Rbar_is_lower_bound (fun x : Rbar => E (Rbar_opp x)) (Rbar_opp l)" with "Rbar_le x l".

original: intros E l. split. - intros H x H'. apply H. unfold Rbar_opp. destruct x; try destruct l; auto. - intros H x H'. specialize (H (Rbar_opp x)). unfold Rbar_opp in H. destruct x; try destruct l; auto.
